casebody.data:
CHAMBLISS
v.
HEALTH SCIENCES FOUNDATION. No. 194P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Colleen Shea, Jaye E. Bingham, Raleigh, for Health Sciences, et al. Gary K. Shipman, William G. Wright, Wilmington, for Kelly & Caroline Chambliss.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of May 2006 by Defendants to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
